bibdata.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE Systems and software engineering
Vocabulary
ISO/IEC/IEEE Systems and software engineering - Vocabulary
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P24765-2009, Sept 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The purpose of this vocabulary is to serve as a useful reference for those in the Information Technology field, and to encourage the use of systems and software engineering standards prepared by ISO/IEC and liaison organizations IEEE and PMI (Project Management Institute). The goal is to provide definitions that are rigorous, uncomplicated, and which can be understood by all concerned

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
